entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
